long_description: Julbo Tensing Sunglasses with Spectron 4 lenses are a great choice for novice mountaineers looking for eye protection from bright sun while glacier traversing. Ultra-wrap profile design delivers maximum protection against high-altitude sun; cutouts aid ventilation. Spectron 4 polycarbonate classic mountaineering lenses block 95% of visible light and 100% of UV rays. Polycarbonate lenses are lightweight yet offer excellent shatter resistance. Flash treatment improves visible light filtering with a mirror effect on the lenses. Anti-reflective coating provides relief from glare off the back of the lenses. Strong frame has a flexible inner layer for comfort against the face and Twin Flex temples for grip. Julbo Tensing Sunglasses feature an Asian fit for those with low-profile nose bridges and flat facial features. Sunglasses come with a microfiber bag.
short_description: Julbo Tensing Sunglasses with Spectron 4 lenses are a great choice for novice mountaineers looking for eye protection from bright sun while glacier traversing.
